attributes.description:
2017 Renault Kadjar 1.2 T Dynamique EDC automatic for sale. Don't miss this awesome automatic SUV with loads of space and comfort. This Kadjar comes with full franchise service history, books and spare key.
This car does have extended service plan and warranty with Renault.
Standard Features: ABS & EBD Braking System, Alloy Wheels, Automatic Lights, Fog Lights, Bi Xenon Headlights, Automatic Locking Doors, Bluetooth Connectivity, Central Locking And Alarm System, Climate Control Aircon, Cruise Control, Electric Windows, Electronic Adjustable Drivers Seat,  Multiple Airbags, Navigation System, Park Distance Controls, Power steering, Radio/CD Player, Steering Wheel Controls, Touch Screen Radio, Traction Control, USB Port

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.
 
Renault Kadjar 1.2 T Dynamique EDC
Power -  96 kW @ 5500 rpm
Torque -  205 Nm @ 2000 rpm
Economy - 5.7 l/100km

Airbags (total) - 6

Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 65 litres
Boot Capacity - 370 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
